code: import cloudyDayIcon from"../../../../assets/weather_icon/Cloudy_day.png";import cloudyIcon from"../../../../assets/weather_icon/Cloudy.png";import showerRainIcon from"../../../../assets/weather_icon/shower.png";import rainIcon from"../../../../assets/weather_icon/Rain.png";import snowIcon from"../../../../assets/weather_icon/Snow.png";import sunnyIcon from"../../../../assets/weather_icon/Sunny.png";const getWeatherIcon=condition=>{if(condition.includes("clear"))return sunnyIcon;if(condition.includes("few clouds"))return cloudyDayIcon;if(condition.includes("drizzle")||condition.includes("thunderstorm")||condition.includes("shower rain"))return showerRainIcon;if(condition.includes("rain")&&!condition.includes("shower"))return rainIcon;if(condition.includes("snow"))return snowIcon;return cloudyIcon;};export default getWeatherIcon;
